caption.p: Inhibitory concentration for 50% reduction (IC 50) of mycelial growth of Alternaria alternata ( A) and Stagonosporopsis cucurbitacearum ( B) by the seven essential oils: C.cit, Cymbopogon citratus; L.dent, Lavandula dentata; L.hyb, Lanvandula hybrida; M.alt, Melaleuca alternifolia; L.nob, Laurus nobilis; and O.maj1/2, Origanum majorana 1/2. Data with different letters ( a– f) are significantly different between treatments ( p ≤ 0.05; Fisher’s LSD).
